heading: HR00400
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON JUSTICE TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE RECENT INCIDENT AT MANILA CITY JAIL WHERE TWO (2) INMATES WERE KILLED AND THIRTY-TWO (32) WERE HURT IN A RIOT BETWEEN MEMBERS OF TWO (2) GROUPS, WITH THE END VIEW OF PROPOSING REMEDIAL LEGISLATION TO IMPROVE THE CONDITIONS OF OUR JAIL FACILITIES
status: Pending with the Committee on JUSTICE since 2019-11-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00400
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON JUSTICE TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE RECENT INCIDENT AT MANILA CITY JAIL WHERE TWO (2) INMATES WERE KILLED AND THIRTY-TWO (32) WERE HURT IN A RIOT BETWEEN MEMBERS OF TWO (2) GROUPS, WITH THE END VIEW OF PROPOSING REMEDIAL LEGISLATION TO IMPROVE THE CONDITIONS OF OUR JAIL FACILITIES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, PRECIOUS HIPOLITO
DATE FILED : 2019-10-01
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON JUSTICE ON 2019-11-27
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2019-10-02;
